topic.title: zeronet-movie-list, a list for movies and shows on Zeronet
topic.body:
Downloading movies to your computer to be able to watch them is a bit archaic.
Watching shows and movies directly on a zite is way more convenient.
That's why I made a list keeping track of all shows and movies that you can watch directly through Zeronet with zero torrent or magnet download.
Feel free to contribute and to share this repository so we can get more and more content!

[zeronet-movie-list](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1GitLiXB6t5r8vuU2zC6a8GYj9ME6HMQ4t/repo/?1LhaSSBtJvGNxVREbkp6NKDnhZfEeyXD8Z)
